text: Zoltán Jeney (March 4, 1943 – October 28, 2019) was a Hungarian composer. Jeney was a professor at the Liszt Ferenc Academy of Music in Budapest, where he was Head of the Department of Composition. Several of his compositions were released on the Hungaroton label.Classics Online website ==Notes== ==Other websites== *Zoltán Jeney page at Budapest Music Center page *Online biography of Jeney at website of the Bozzini Quartet. title: Zoltán Jeney
